main event: One object, round and silver, was observed following a B-36 aircraft, then stopped for a while before going straight up.
interesting points: The object was about the size of a pea,Two men were watching the B-36 fly and observed the object,The object was observed visually from the ground,There was a weather balloon released near the same time as the sighting,The reporting officer believed the object could have been a balloon.
witness description: two men observing from the ground
